text: Absolutely agree with @Rahman on the #HealthyBottomLine podcast! Preventive medicine is key to a thriving society, yet it's still not getting the recognition & support it deserves post-pandemic 🤕 We must invest in preventive care to ensure early detection, promote wellness, and reduce healthcare costs. Let's back #PreventiveMedicine & create a healthier future for all! 💪🩺🌍
